name: last

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
LAST finds similar regions between sequences, and aligns them. It is
designed for comparing large datasets to each other (e.g. vertebrate
genomes and/or large numbers of DNA reads).

dependencies.name: zlib-api
dependencies.description:
A free, general-purpose, legally unencumbered lossless data-compression
library.

dependent_to.name: redundans
dependent_to.description: Redundans pipeline assists an assembly of heterozygous genomes.
